addon_accessControl.name: Access Control Testing
addon_accessControl.description: Adds a set of tools for testing access control in web applications.
addon_accessControl.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_accessControl.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.14.0.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Link website alert pages and help (Issues 8189).
  • The results table now presents the same context menu as other similar tables (History, Search, etc) facilitating copying URLs, etc (Issue 8356).
  • Now has a table export button (Issue 8356).
  • Adjusted some labels/titles to use title caps (Issue 2000 & 8356).

Fixed

  • Now uses the General Font (Issue 8356), as set in the Display options.

addon_alertFilters.name: Alert Filters
addon_alertFilters.description: Allows you to automate the changing of alert risk levels.
addon_alertFilters.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_allinonenotes.name: All In One Notes
addon_allinonenotes.description: A simple extension to view all notes in one pane.
addon_allinonenotes.author: David Vassallo
addon_allinonenotes.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Update link to repository.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_ascanrules.name: Active scanner rules
addon_ascanrules.description: The release status Active Scanner rules
addon_ascanrules.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_ascanrules.changes:
Changed

  • The following rules now includes example alert functionality for documentation generation purposes (Issue 6119), as well as now including Alert Tags (OWASP Top 10, WSTG, and updated CWE):
    • Server Side Template Injection
    • Server Side Template Injection (Blind)

Fixed

  • False positives in the Path Traversal rule.
  • Alert text for various rules has been updated to more consistently use periods and spaces in a uniform manner.
  • False Positives in the Remote File Inclusion rule (Issue 8561).

addon_ascanrulesAlpha.name: Active scanner rules (alpha)
addon_ascanrulesAlpha.description: The alpha status Active Scanner rules
addon_ascanrulesAlpha.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_ascanrulesAlpha.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.

Fixed

  • Alert text for various rules has been updated to more consistently use periods and spaces in a uniform manner.
  • Potential false positives in the LDAP Injection scan rule when the original message resulted in an error to start with (Issue 8519).

addon_ascanrulesBeta.name: Active scanner rules (beta)
addon_ascanrulesBeta.description: The beta status Active Scanner rules
addon_ascanrulesBeta.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_ascanrulesBeta.changes:
Changed

  • The following scan rules now include example alert functionality for documentation generation purposes (Issue 6119):
    • Expression Language Injection
    • Cookie Slack Detector

Fixed

  • Potential false positives in the Source Code Disclosure - File Inclusion scan rule when responses are empty or the original message resulted in an error to start with (Issue 8517).
  • A spacing/punctuation issue in the Cookie Slack Detector scan rule, whereby the Other Info field would not have a space after colons and before lists of cookie names.

addon_attacksurfacedetector.name: Attack Surface Detector
addon_attacksurfacedetector.description: The Attack Surface Detector analyzes web application source code to generate endpoints that can be used for penetration testing.
addon_attacksurfacedetector.author: Secure Decisions (Matthew DeLetto)
addon_attacksurfacedetector.changes:
Various incremental changes (see https://github.com/secdec/attack-surface-detector-zap/releases)
Fix un-handled exception when target unavailable & address various "house keeping" tasks.

addon_authhelper.name: Authentication Helper
addon_authhelper.description: Helps identify and set up authentication handling
addon_authhelper.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_authhelper.changes:
Changed

  • Restored stats removed in previous release as these could be used in AF tests.

addon_authstats.name: Authentication Statistics
addon_authstats.description: Records logged in/out statistics for all contexts in scope.
addon_authstats.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_authstats.changes:
Added

  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Dynamically unload the add-on.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.

addon_automation.name: Automation Framework
addon_automation.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_automation.changes:
Added

  • Allow to configure the structural parameters of a context (Issue 7780).

Fixed

  • NPE in GUI if the technology was not specified.

Changed

  • Rely on Passive Scanner add-on for the passive scan related jobs (Issue 7959).

Deprecated

  • The classes of the passive scan related jobs are now deprecated and will be removed in a following release, use the classes from the Passive Scanner add-on instead (Issue 7959).

addon_beanshell.name: BeanShell Console
addon_beanshell.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_beanshell.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Improve permissions and space handling when saving.

addon_browserView.name: Browser View
addon_browserView.description: Adds an option to render HTML responses like a browser
addon_browserView.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_browserView.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Make missing JavaFX logging less verbose in regular use.
  • Update help with the requirements to use the add-on.

addon_bruteforce.name: Forced Browse
addon_bruteforce.description: Forced browsing of files and directories using code from the OWASP DirBuster tool
addon_bruteforce.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_bruteforce.changes:
Added

  • Support for menu weights (Issue 8369).

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • Help content typos.

addon_bugtracker.name: Bug Tracker
addon_bugtracker.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_bugtracker.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.1.
  • Dependency updates.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Updated to use PAT not password (https://github.blog/changelog/2021-08-12-git-password-authentication-is-shutting-down/).

addon_callgraph.name: Call Graph
addon_callgraph.description: Allows the user to view a call graph of the selected resources
addon_callgraph.author: Colm O'Flaherty
addon_callgraph.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_callhome.name: Call Home
addon_callhome.description: Handles all of the calls to ZAP services.
addon_callhome.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_client.name: Client Side Integration
addon_client.description: Exposes client (browser) side information in ZAP using Firefox and Chrome extensions.
addon_client.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_commonlib.name: Common Library
addon_commonlib.description: A common library, for use by other add-ons.
addon_commonlib.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_commonlib.changes:
Fixed

  • Address false positives/negatives when handling cookies without name value pair separator (Issue 8613).

addon_communityScripts.name: Community Scripts
addon_communityScripts.description: Useful ZAP scripts written by the ZAP community.
addon_communityScripts.author: ZAP Community
addon_communityScripts.changes:
Added

  • extender/arpSyndicateSubdomainDiscovery.js - uses the API of ARPSyndicate's Subdomain Center to find and add subdomains to the Sites Tree.
  • passive/JavaDisclosure.js - Passive scan for Java error messages leaks
  • httpsender/RsaEncryptPayloadForZap.py - A script that encrypts requests using RSA
  • selenium/FillOTPInMFA.js - A script that fills the OTP in MFA
  • authentication/KratosApiAuthentication.js - A script to authenticate with Kratos using the API flow
  • authentication/KratosBrowserAuthentication.js - A script to authenticate with Kratos using the browser flow

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.
  • Use Prettier to format all JavaScript scripts.
  • Update the following scripts to implement the getMetadata() function with revised metadata:
    • active/Cross Site WebSocket Hijacking.js
    • active/cve-2019-5418.js
    • active/gof_lite.js
    • active/JWT None Exploit.js
    • active/SSTI.js
    • passive/clacks.js
    • passive/CookieHTTPOnly.js
    • passive/detect_csp_notif_and_reportonly.js
    • passive/detect_samesite_protection.js
    • passive/f5_bigip_cookie_internal_ip.js
    • passive/find base64 strings.js
    • passive/Find Credit Cards.js
    • passive/Find Emails.js
    • passive/Find Hashes.js
    • passive/Find HTML Comments.js
    • passive/Find IBANs.js
    • passive/Find Internal IPs.js
    • passive/find_reflected_params.py
    • passive/HUNT.py
    • passive/Mutliple Security Header Check.js
    • passive/google_api_keys_finder.js
    • passive/JavaDisclosure.js
    • passive/Report non static sites.js
    • passive/RPO.js
    • passive/s3.js
    • passive/Server Header Disclosure.js
    • passive/SQL injection detection.js
    • passive/Telerik Using Poor Crypto.js
    • passive/Upload form discovery.js
    • passive/X-Powered-By_header_checker.js
  • httpsender/Alert on Unexpected Content Types.js now checks for common content-types (json, xml, and yaml) more consistently.
  • targeted/request_to_xml.js no longer uses deprecated method to show the message in the editor dialogue.

addon_coreLang.name: Core Language Files
addon_coreLang.description: Translations of the core language files
addon_coreLang.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_coreLang.changes:
Changed

  • Update the languages files from Crowdin.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.1.

addon_custompayloads.name: Custom Payloads
addon_custompayloads.description: Ability to add, edit or remove payloads that are used i.e. by active scanners
addon_custompayloads.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_custompayloads.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.14.0.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Promoted to Beta.

Added

  • Initial API support:
    • Actions
      • Enable payloads.
      • Disable payloads.
      • Enable payload.
      • Disable payload.
      • Add payload.
      • Remove payload.
    • Views:
      • Payload categories.
      • Payloads (optionally filtered by category).

addon_database.name: Database
addon_database.description: Provides database engines and related infrastructure.
addon_database.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_dev.name: Dev Add-on
addon_dev.description: An add-on to help with development of ZAP.
addon_dev.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_dev.changes:
Added

  • Page protected by auth in order to provide a simple test for authenticated spidering.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.

addon_diff.name: Diff
addon_diff.description: Displays a dialog showing the differences between 2 requests or responses. It uses diffutils and diff_match_patch
addon_diff.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_diff.changes:
Added

  • Support for menu weights (Issue 8369).

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_directorylistv1.name: Directory List v1.0
addon_directorylistv1.description: List of directory names to be used with Forced Browse or Fuzzer add-on.
addon_directorylistv1.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_directorylistv2_3.name: Directory List v2.3
addon_directorylistv2_3.description: Lists of directory names to be used with Forced Browse or Fuzzer add-on.
addon_directorylistv2_3.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_directorylistv2_3.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.

addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.name: Directory List v2.3 LC
addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.description: Lists of lower case directory names to be used with Forced Browse or Fuzzer add-on.
addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.

addon_encoder.name: Encoder
addon_encoder.description: Adds encode/decode/hash dialog and support for scripted processors as well
addon_encoder.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_encoder.changes:
Added

  • Support for menu weights (Issue 8369)

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_evalvillain.name: Eval Villain
addon_evalvillain.description: Adds the Eval Villain extension to Firefox when launched from ZAP.
addon_evalvillain.author: Dennis Goodlett and the ZAP Dev Team
addon_evalvillain.changes:
Changed

  • Updated with new version of Eval Villain.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.13.0.

addon_exim.name: Import/Export
addon_exim.author: ZAP Dev Team & thatsn0tmysite
addon_exim.changes:
Changed

  • HAR importing now uses Sebastian Stöhr's har-reader library. It should be much more tolerant of 'weird' HAR things, and thus be able to import more samples. (If you come across HAR that won't import please open an issue and provide a sample so we can work on further improvements!)

addon_fileupload.name: FileUpload
addon_fileupload.description: Detect File upload requests and scan them to find related vulnerabilities
addon_fileupload.author: KSASAN preetkaran20@gmail.com

addon_formhandler.name: Value Generator
addon_formhandler.description: This Value Generator Add-on allows a user to define field names and values to be used when submitting values to an app. Fields can be added, modified, enabled/disabled, and deleted.
addon_formhandler.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_fuzz.name: Fuzzer
addon_fuzz.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_fuzz.changes:
Added

  • Support for menu weights (Issue 8369)

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_fuzzdb.name: FuzzDB Files
addon_fuzzdb.description: FuzzDB files which can be used with the ZAP fuzzer
addon_fuzzdb.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_fuzzdb.changes:
Changed

  • Updated RAFT lists based on more recent SecLists contributions
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.1.

addon_fuzzdboffensive.name: FuzzDB Offensive
addon_fuzzdboffensive.description: FuzzDB web backdoors and attack files which can be used with the ZAP fuzzer or for manual penetration testing - contains files that may well be flagged by anti-virus tools
addon_fuzzdboffensive.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_fuzzdboffensive.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.14.0.
  • Updated help and description to say this may cause problems with anti-virus tools (Issue 8297).

addon_gettingStarted.name: Getting Started with ZAP Guide
addon_gettingStarted.description: A short Getting Started with ZAP Guide
addon_gettingStarted.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_graaljs.name: GraalVM JavaScript
addon_graaljs.description: Provides the GraalVM JavaScript engine for ZAP scripting.
addon_graaljs.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_graaljs.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.
  • Disable warns about the engine being executed in interpreter mode, that's the expected mode of execution.

addon_groovy.name: Groovy Support
addon_groovy.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_groovy.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.14.0.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Replace usage of singletons with injected variables (e.g. model, control) in scripts.
  • Dependency updates.
  • Update Active and Passive Script Templates to include a getMetadata function. This will allow them to be used as regular scan rules.
  • Depend on the commonlib and scripts add-ons for scan rule scripts.

Fixed

  • Updated encode-decode script template to conform to the latest method signatures.

addon_grpc.name: gRPC Support
addon_grpc.description: Inspect, attack gRPC endpoints, and decode protobuf messages.
addon_grpc.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_grpc.changes:
Added

  • gRPC WebSocket Support Added

Fixed

  • Do not try to decode non-gRPC responses when active scanning, which would lead to unnecessary warnings.

addon_help.name: Help - English
addon_help.description: English version of the ZAP help file.
addon_help.author: ZAP Crowdin Team
addon_help.changes:
Added

  • -loglevel option to the command line help page.

Changed

  • Update OWASP ZAP homepage link in 1.1.0 release notes.
  • Updated for 2.15.0.

addon_help_ar_SA.name: Help - Arabic
addon_help_ar_SA.description: Arabic version of the ZAP help file.
addon_help_ar_SA.author: ZAP Crowdin Team

addon_help_bs_BA.name: Help - Bosnian
addon_help_bs_BA.description: Bosnian version of the ZAP help file.
addon_help_bs_BA.author: ZAP Crowdin Team
addon_help_bs_BA.changes: Updated with the latest files from crowdin

addon_help_es_ES.name: Help - Spanish
addon_help_es_ES.description: Spanish version of the ZAP help file.
addon_help_es_ES.author: ZAP Crowdin Team
addon_help_es_ES.changes:

  • Updated with the latest files from crowdin

addon_help_fil_PH.description: Filipino version of the ZAP help file.

addon_help_fil_PH.changes:

  • Updated with the latest files from crowdin

addon_help_fr_FR.description: French version of the ZAP help file.
addon_help_fr_FR.author: ZAP Crowdin Team
addon_help_fr_FR.changes:

  • Updated with the latest files from crowdin

addon_help_pt_BR.description: Portuguese, Brazilian version of the ZAP help file.

addon_help_ru_RU.description: Russian version of the ZAP help file.

addon_help_zh_CN.changes:
Changed

  • Updated with the latest files from crowdin

addon_highlighter.name: Highlighter
addon_highlighter.description: Allows you to highlight strings in the request and response tabs.
addon_highlighter.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_highlighter.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_hud.name: HUD - Heads Up Display
addon_hud.description: Display information from ZAP in browser.
addon_hud.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_hud.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.
  • Disable the HUD by default - it still works but its flaky, and currently not a focus for us.

addon_imagelocationscanner.name: Image Location and Privacy Scanner
addon_imagelocationscanner.description: Image Location and Privacy Passive Scanner
addon_imagelocationscanner.author: Jay Ball (veggiespam) and the ZAP Dev Team
addon_imagelocationscanner.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.14.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

Added

  • Website alert links (Issue 8189).

addon_invoke.name: Invoke Applications
addon_invoke.description: Invoke external applications passing context related information such as URLs and parameters
addon_invoke.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_invoke.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.

Added

  • Support for menu weights (Issue 8369)

addon_jruby.name: Ruby Scripting
addon_jruby.description: Allows Ruby to be used for ZAP scripting - templates included
addon_jruby.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_jruby.changes:
Changed

  • Update links to zaproxy repo.
  • Rename reliability to confidence in active/passive templates.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_jsonview.name: JSON View
addon_jsonview.description: Adds a view that shows JSON messages nicely formatted
addon_jsonview.author: Juha Kivekäs
addon_jsonview.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.13.0.
  • Depend on Common Library add-on to reuse libraries (Issue 7961).

Fixed

  • Use other library to format the JSON bodies (Issue 7798).

addon_jwt.name: JWT Support
addon_jwt.description: Detect JWT requests and scan them to find related vulnerabilities
addon_jwt.author: KSASAN preetkaran20@gmail.com
addon_jwt.changes:
• First version of JWT Support.
    • Contains scanning rules for basic JWT related vulnerabilities.
    • Contains JWT Fuzzer for fuzzing the JWT's present in the request.

addon_jython.name: Python Scripting
addon_jython.description: Allows Python to be used for ZAP scripting - templates included
addon_jython.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_jython.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update Active and Passive Script Templates to include a getMetadata function. This will allow them to be used as regular scan rules.
  • Depend on the commonlib add-on for scan rule scripts.
  • Update minimum scripts add-on version to 45.1.0.

addon_kotlin.name: Kotlin Support
addon_kotlin.description: Allows Kotlin to be used for ZAP scripting
addon_kotlin.author: StackHawk Engineering
addon_kotlin.changes:
Changed

  • Use appropriate syntax style for highlighting of code.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_levoai.name: Levo.ai
addon_levoai.description: Build OpenAPI Specs with ZAP traffic using Levo.ai.
addon_levoai.author: Levo.ai
addon_levoai.changes:
Added

  • Option to configure an organization ID that is added as a header in the requests made to the Satellite.
  • Option to specify the environment under which the discovered apps will be shown in the Levo dashboard.
  • Set the sensor type in the requests made to the Satellite.

addon_maplocal.name: Map Local
addon_maplocal.description: Allows mapping of responses to content of a chosen local file.
addon_maplocal.author: Keindel (Andrey Maksimov)
addon_maplocal.changes:
• First version of Map Local extension. Provides feature to map Response Body to a content of chosen local file.
    • Has status panel in UI with 3 columns: Enabled / URL / Local Path.
    • Has add / edit dialog with browse button to choose file.
    • Has file choice verification check.
    • Popup menus in sites and history, edit / remove - popups in status panel.
    • Persists to session DB.

addon_neonmarker.name: Neonmarker
addon_neonmarker.description: Colors history table items based on tags
addon_neonmarker.author: Juha Kivekäs, Kingthorin
addon_neonmarker.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • The script example in the Help content was updated to use the injected core variables instead of using the fully qualified class name.

Fixed

  • An NPE which could happen when removing an entry that didn't yet have a tag assigned.

addon_network.name: Network
addon_network.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_network.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • Guard against user without authentication state.
  • Fix exception after regenerating the root CA cert during ZAP startup (Issue 8499).
  • Use configured timeout as default.

addon_oast.name: OAST Support
addon_oast.description: Allows you to exploit out-of-band vulnerabilities
addon_oast.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_openapi.name: OpenAPI Support
addon_openapi.author: ZAP Dev Team plus Joanna Bona, Nathalie Bouchahine, Artur Grzesica, Mohammad Kamar, Markus Kiss, Michal Materniak, Marcin Spiewak, and SDA SE Open Industry Solutions
addon_openapi.changes:
Changed

  • Workaround issue loading fully resolved definitions that are too large by trying to use the original definition only (Issue 8193).

addon_packpentester.name: Collection: Pentester Pack
addon_packpentester.description: A collection of add-ons ideal for pentesters
addon_packpentester.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_packscanrules.name: Collection: Scan Rules Pack
addon_packscanrules.description: All of the add-ons just containing release, beta and alpha status scan rules
addon_packscanrules.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_paramdigger.name: Parameter Digger
addon_paramdigger.description: Identify hidden, unlinked parameters. Useful for finding web cache poisoning vulnerabilities.
addon_paramdigger.author: ZAP Dev Team and Arkaprabha Chakraborty
addon_paramdigger.changes:
Added

  • Support for menu weights (Issue 8369)

Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.
  • The output panel is now properly reset on ZAP session change (part of Issue 7694).

addon_plugnhack.name: Plug-n-Hack Configuration
addon_plugnhack.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_plugnhack.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.
  • Use Network add-on to obtain main proxy address/port.

addon_pscan.name: Passive Scanner
addon_pscan.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_pscan.changes:
Added

  • Provide the Passive Rules script type (Issue 7959).
  • Provide the Stats Passive Scan Rule (Issue 7959).
  • Provide the scan status label (Issue 7959).
  • Provide the pscan API on newer ZAP versions (Issue 7959).
  • Dynamically un/load add-on passive scan rules (Issue 7959).

addon_pscanrules.name: Passive scanner rules
addon_pscanrules.description: The release status Passive Scanner rules
addon_pscanrules.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_pscanrules.changes:
Changed

  • Clarified Missing Anti-clickjacking Header description.
  • Depend on Passive Scanner add-on to include it by default (Issue 7959).
  • Re-examine Cache-control Directives scan rule now ignores cache-control for POST method requests (Issue 8592).

Fixed

  • Polyfill scan rule running slowly.
  • Only scan text responses for:
    • Hash Disclosure
    • Private IP Disclosure
    • Username Hash Found
  • Performance improvements for:
    • Cross-Domain JavaScript Source File Inclusion.
    • Cross-Domain Misconfiguration.

addon_pscanrulesAlpha.name: Passive scanner rules (alpha)
addon_pscanrulesAlpha.description: The alpha status Passive Scanner rules
addon_pscanrulesAlpha.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_pscanrulesAlpha.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.

Fixed

  • Alert text for various rules has been updated to more consistently use periods and spaces in a uniform manner.

addon_pscanrulesBeta.name: Passive scanner rules (beta)
addon_pscanrulesBeta.description: The beta status Passive Scanner rules
addon_pscanrulesBeta.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_pscanrulesBeta.changes:
Fixed

  • A possible false positive condition with the Dangerous JS Functions scan rule with substrings in certain circumstances (Issue 8553).

addon_quickstart.name: Quick Start
addon_quickstart.description: Provides a tab which allows you to quickly test a target application
addon_quickstart.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_quickstart.changes:
Fixed

  • Do not change the URL field of the Manual Explore panel when the Mode changes (Issue 8591).

addon_regextester.name: Regular Expression Tester
addon_regextester.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_regextester.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

Fixed

  • Close dialogues when the add-on is uninstalled.

addon_replacer.name: Replacer
addon_replacer.description: Easy way to replace strings in requests and responses.
addon_replacer.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_reports.name: Report Generation
addon_reports.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_reports.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes related to Passive Scanner add-on (Issue 7959).

addon_requester.name: Requester
addon_requester.description: Allows to manually edit and send messages.
addon_requester.author: Surikato and the ZAP Dev Team
addon_requester.changes:
Added

  • Allow to display a message in the editor dialogue.

addon_retest.name: Retest
addon_retest.description: An add-on to retest for presence/absence of previously generated alerts.
addon_retest.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_retest.changes:
Changed

  • Use the Passive Scanner add-on for the Automation Framework passive scan jobs (Issue 7959).

addon_retire.name: Retire.js
addon_retire.description: Use Retire.js to identify vulnerable or out-dated JavaScript packages.
addon_retire.author: Nikita Mundhada and the ZAP Dev Team
addon_retire.changes:
Changed

  • Updated with upstream retire.js pattern changes.

Added

  • A helpful description for the add-on.

addon_reveal.name: Reveal
addon_reveal.description: Show hidden fields and enable disabled fields
addon_reveal.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_revisit.name: Revisit
addon_revisit.description: Revisit a site at any time in the past using the session history
addon_revisit.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_revisit.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.14.0.

Fixed

  • Prevent exception when processing history after deleting messages.

addon_saml.name: SAML Support
addon_saml.description: Detect, Show, Edit, Fuzz SAML requests
addon_saml.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_scripts.name: Script Console
addon_scripts.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_scripts.changes:
Removed

  • Remove the active and passive script templates, superseded by the ones provided by the GraalVM JavaScript add-on.

addon_selenium.name: Selenium
addon_selenium.description: WebDriver provider and includes HtmlUnit browser
addon_selenium.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_selenium.changes:
Added

  • Link to "no browser" FAQ in warning messages.

Changed

  • Update Selenium to version 4.24.0.

addon_sequence.name: Sequence
addon_sequence.description: Gives the possibility of defining a sequence of requests to be scanned.
addon_sequence.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_sequence.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.14.0.

Fixed

  • Prevent exception if no display (Issue 3978).

addon_soap.name: SOAP Support
addon_soap.description: Imports and scans WSDL files containing SOAP endpoints.
addon_soap.author: Alberto (albertov91) + ZAP Dev Team

addon_spider.name: Spider
addon_spider.description: Spider used for automatically finding URIs on a site.
addon_spider.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_spider.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.

Added

  • Support for menu weights (Issue 8369)

Fixed

  • Fix grammatical error in help content.

addon_spiderAjax.name: Ajax Spider
addon_spiderAjax.description: Allows you to spider sites that make heavy use of JavaScript using Crawljax
addon_spiderAjax.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_spiderAjax.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes related to Passive Scanner add-on (Issue 7959).

addon_sqliplugin.name: Advanced SQLInjection Scanner
addon_sqliplugin.description: An advanced active injection bundle for SQLi (derived by SQLMap)
addon_sqliplugin.author: Andrea Pompili (Yhawke)
addon_sqliplugin.changes:
Fixed

  • Re-ordered variable initialization to prevent an NPE.

addon_sse.name: Server-Sent Events
addon_sse.description: Allows you to view Server-Sent Events (SSE) communication.
addon_sse.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_sse.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.15.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • More gracefully handle missing value for "id" field (Issue 8320)

addon_svndigger.name: SVN Digger Files
addon_svndigger.description: SVN Digger files which can be used with ZAP forced browsing
addon_svndigger.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_svndigger.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Promote to release status.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.

addon_tokengen.name: Token Generation and Analysis
addon_tokengen.description: Allows you to generate and analyze pseudo random tokens, such as those used for session handling or CSRF protection
addon_tokengen.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_tokengen.changes:
Changed

  • Now using 2.10 logging infrastructure (Log4j 2.x).
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_treetools.name: TreeTools
addon_treetools.description: Tools to add functionality to the tree view.
addon_treetools.author: Carl Sampson
addon_treetools.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_wappalyzer.name: Technology Detection
addon_wappalyzer.description: Technology detection using various fingerprints and identifiers.
addon_wappalyzer.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_wappalyzer.changes:
Added

  • Request stats.

Fixed

  • Example alert details for documentation generation (Issue 6119).

addon_webdriverlinux.name: Linux WebDrivers

addon_websocket.description: Allows you to inspect WebSocket communication.
addon_websocket.author: ZAP Dev Team

Added

  • Support for menu weights (Issue 8369)

Changed

  • Maintenance changes.

addon_zest.name: Zest - Graphical Security Scripting Language
addon_zest.description: A graphical security scripting language, ZAPs macro language on steroids
addon_zest.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_zest.changes:
Added

  • Document the engine name in the help page.

Changed

  • Use script engines from ZAP when executing scripts.
  • Update Zest library to 0.22.0:
    • Update Selenium to version 4.22.0.
